content:
The chunk of code creates a new root node as a parent of `colNp`, constructs a collision tree under it using `r_constructCollisionTree()`, and stashes the original `colNp` node, effectively replacing its collision structure with an optimized hierarchical organization.

root = colNp.getParent().attachNewNode('%s-subDivRoot' % colNp.getName())
        self.r_constructCollisionTree(solidTree, root, colNp.getName())
        colNp.stash()
